item.title: Uptime monitoring tools
item.description: Sometimes people cann’t believe in their infrastructure. This can be easily understood because maintaining complex software integrates several pieces of information. Moreover, people sometimes hire bad IT solutions and as a result, shit accidents happen. I have been using some tools to report me web server down time. Here we go: monitor.us: it is a powerful tool that provides several features. I am currently using it to monitor a specific term in a specific page.
